content.body: can someone help me to understand the correct behaviour of sequential focusing when the current focused element is not in `Document's sequential navigation order`. I've filed a bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1824805

content.body: I think this eventually fits into `Let candidate be the first suitable sequentially focusable area in the home document following starting point, if any; or else null `, however I don't understand what `following starting point` means
